parts.text: {"word":"overspread","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(場所・表面)を覆う、広がる、蔓延する","english_definition":"to spread over or cover (something).","examples":[{"sentence":"The ivy overspread the walls of the old house.","translation":"ツタが古い家の壁を覆った。"},{"sentence":"A thick fog overspread the valley.","translation":"濃い霧が谷を覆った。"},{"sentence":"Darkness overspread the land.","translation":"暗闇が大地を覆った。"}],"collocations":["overspread a surface (表面を覆う)","overspread a region (地域に広がる)","overspread with something (～で覆われる)"],"synonyms":["cover","blanket","envelop","permeate","suffuse"],"antonyms":["uncover","expose","reveal"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(場所・表面)に広がる、蔓延する","english_definition":"to spread or extend over a surface or area.","examples":[{"sentence":"The disease quickly overspread throughout the population.","translation":"その病気はすぐに人口全体に蔓延した。"},{"sentence":"The floodwaters overspread the fields.","translation":"洪水が畑に広がった。"}],"collocations":["overspread rapidly (急速に広がる)","overspread widely (広く広がる)"],"synonyms":["spread","extend","expand","proliferate"],"antonyms":["recede","contract","diminish"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「over-」(上に) + 「spread」(広げる) から構成される。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌoʊvərˈsprɛd/","syllables":"o-ver-spread"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["overspread","overspreads"],"past_simple":"overspread","past_participle":"overspread","present_participle":"overspreading"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**overspread**」は、あるものが別のものの表面全体に広がり、覆う様子を表す動詞です。物理的なもの（霧、ツタ、洪水など）が広がる場合にも、抽象的なもの（暗闇、病気など）が広がる場合にも使用できます。過去形・過去分詞形は「overspread」のまま変化しないことが多いですが、「overspreaded」という形も稀に使われます。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The ivy was overspreading on the wall.","correct":"✓ The ivy was overspreading the wall.","note":"「overspread」は他動詞なので、目的語を直接取ります。「on」などの前置詞は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The fog overspreaded the city.","correct":"✓ The fog overspread the city.","note":"過去形・過去分詞形は「overspread」です。「overspreaded」も文法的に誤りではありませんが、一般的ではありません。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["overspreading (形容詞: 広がっている、覆っている)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"related_verbs":["spread","cover","blanket","envelop"],"related_nouns":["spread","covering","blanket"]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C2","frequency_google_ngram":"低頻度 (Low frequency) - 比較的フォーマルな語彙。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**overspread**」は、あるものが別のものの表面全体に広がり、覆う様子を表す、ややフォーマルな単語です。例えば、ツタが壁を「overspread（覆う）」、霧が谷を「overspread（覆う）」のように使います。日常会話ではあまり使われず、「cover」や「spread」といったより一般的な単語で言い換えられることが多いです。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"A sense of unease overspread the room as the news was announced.","translation":"そのニュースが発表されると、不安感が部屋中に広がった。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"覆う (抽象的なもの)"},{"sentence":"The morning dew overspread the grass.","translation":"朝露が草を覆った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"覆う (物理的なもの)"}]}
